wxPropertyGrid Property Attribute Identifiers

wxPropertyGrid::SetPropertyAttribute accepts one of these as attrid argument when used with one of the built-in property classes. More...

Defines

#define wxPG_BOOL_USE_CHECKBOX   64
 wxBoolProperty specific, int, default 0.

#define wxPG_FLOAT_PRECISION   65
 wxFloatProperty specific, int, default 6.

#define wxPG_FILE_WILDCARD   66
 wxFileProperty/wxImageFileProperty specific, wxChar*, default is detected/varies.

#define wxPG_FILE_SHOW_FULL_PATH   67
 wxFileProperty/wxImageFileProperty specific, int, default 1.

#define wxPG_USER_ATTRIBUTE   192
 First attribute id that is guaranteed not to be used built-in properties.

Detailed Description

wxPropertyGrid::SetPropertyAttribute accepts one of these as attrid argument when used with one of the built-in property classes.

Define Documentation

#define wxPG_BOOL_USE_CHECKBOX   64
 

wxBoolProperty specific, int, default 0.

When > 0 sets bool property to use checkbox instead of choice.

#define wxPG_FILE_SHOW_FULL_PATH   67
 

wxFileProperty/wxImageFileProperty specific, int, default 1.

When 0, only the file name is shown (i.e. drive and directory are hidden).

#define wxPG_FILE_WILDCARD   66
 

wxFileProperty/wxImageFileProperty specific, wxChar*, default is detected/varies.

Sets the wildcard used in the triggered wxFileDialog. Format is the same.

#define wxPG_FLOAT_PRECISION   65
 

wxFloatProperty specific, int, default 6.

Sets the precision used when floating point value is rendered as text.
